title: Failed promos to challenger I am quitting the game
body: Good bye world R.I.P I'm going back to Korea fk dis

replies.body:
Be happy you can at least play with out lags lol. 

it is good to vent your frustration by posting on the forums :), instead of murdering your neighbors chicken.
